word:
W. C. SISLEY--WE WILL LET IT STAND, OF COURSE; BUT YOU ASKED ME IF WE WERE PAYING THE SAME. 
                                                                           33
ROYALTY. BROTHER WHITE CAME HERE FROM OVER THERE, AND WE SPENT DAYS IN TRYING TO REVISE THAT MATTER. IF WE HAVE NOT SETTLED ON THE RIGHT THING-----
